description: Roguish magic comes easily to you.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Major magic rogue talent, minor magic rogue talent. Benefit: You gain an additional daily use of each of your minor magic and major magic rogue talents.

sections.text: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain an additional daily use of each talent.
sections.name: Special

prerequisites: minor magic rogue talent. Benefit: You gain an additional daily use of each of your minor magic and major magic rogue talents
name: Talented Magician
